description: Gets and starts the next pending (status IN_PROGRESS or QUEUED) job execution for a thing. Requires permission to access the StartNextPendingJobExecution action.

parameters.name: thingName
parameters.description: The name of the thing associated with the device.

parameters.name: statusDetails
parameters.description: A collection of name/value pairs that describe the status of the job execution. If not specified, the statusDetails are unchanged. The maximum length of the value in the name/value pair is 1,024 characters. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: stepTimeoutInMinutes
parameters.description: Specifies the amount of time this device has to finish execution of this job. If the job execution status is not set to a terminal state before this timer expires, or before the timer is reset (by calling UpdateJobExecution, setting the status to IN_PROGRESS, and specifying a new timeout value in field stepTimeoutInMinutes) the job execution status will be automatically set to TIMED_OUT. Note that setting the step timeout has no effect on the in progress timeout that may have been specified when the job was created ( CreateJob using field timeoutConfig). Valid values for this parameter range from 1 to 10080 (1 minute to 7 days).

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the thing that is executing the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the job execution. Can be one of: 'QUEUED', 'IN_PROGRESS', 'FAILED', 'SUCCESS', 'CANCELED', 'TIMED_OUT', 'REJECTED', or 'REMOVED'.

nested_items.name: statusDetails
nested_items.description: A collection of name/value pairs that describe the status of the job execution.

nested_items.name: queuedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was enqueued.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was started.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was last updated.

nested_items.name: approximateSecondsBeforeTimedOut
nested_items.description: The estimated number of seconds that remain before the job execution status will be changed to TIMED_OUT. The actual job execution timeout can occur up to 60 seconds later than the estimated duration.

nested_items.name: versionNumber
nested_items.description: The version of the job execution. Job execution versions are incremented each time they are updated by a device.

nested_items.name: executionNumber
nested_items.description: A number that identifies a particular job execution on a particular device. It can be used later in commands that return or update job execution information.

nested_items.name: jobDocument
nested_items.description: The content of the job document.
